alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 7:56PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT COCONINO COUNTY THROUGH 830 PM MST... At 754 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain showers 7 miles northeast of Clints Well, or 27 miles north of Payson, moving northeast at 25 mph. Slushy snow is also possible with near zero visibility impacting Road 3/Lake Mary Road and Highway 87. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clints Well, Soldiers Annex Lake, Blue Ridge Reservoir, Tremaine Lake, Elks Group CG, Soldiers Lake, Starlight Pines, Blue Ridge Campground, Long Lake, Rock Crossing Campground, Chavez Mountain, and Clints Well Campground. This includes State Route 87 between mile markers 291 and 320. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County
